casebody.data:
Jamie MYERS and Ericka Myers, Individually and on Behalf of Their Minor Deceased Child, Tyler Myers, and Peyton Myers (their Minor Son)
v.
Brad M. WELCH, Valentine & Leblanc, LLC ; Security National Insurance Company and Southern Farm Bureau Casualty Insurance Company NO. 2017-C-2165 Supreme Court of Louisiana. March 9, 2018 Denied. JOHNSON, C.J., would grant.

HUGHES, J., would grant.

GENOVESE, J., would grant.
